org.hypknowsys.wumprep4weka.gui
Class AbstractFilePropertyEditor

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.hypknowsys.wumprep4weka.gui.AbstractFilePropertyEditor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.beans.PropertyEditor, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, weka.gui.CustomPanelSupplier
Direct Known Subclasses:
DirectoryPropertyEditor, FilePropertyEditor
public abstract class AbstractFilePropertyEditor
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.beans.PropertyEditor, weka.gui.CustomPanelSupplier, java.awt.event.FocusListener

Provides a component comprised of an editable JTextField and a button that opens a file or directory selection dialog. This abstract class provides the general functionality. The FilePropertyEditor and classes provide concrete implementations for selecting files or directories only, respectively. You can inherit from this class for providing more specialized file or directory selection controls. Besides providing the necessary constructors, you have to override the initialize() method.

Version:
$Id: AbstractFilePropertyEditor.java,v 1.4 2005/10/16 13:24:32 cpohle Exp $
Author:
Carsten Pohle (cp AT cpohle de)

Creates a new AbstractFilePropertyEditor component for selecting files of type fd.

Parameters:
dialogTitle - The title to be used for the file selection dialog.
filter - The file filter for the type of files that can be selected using this component.
fileSelectionMode - One of JFileChooser.FILES_AND_DIRECTORIES, JFileChooser.FILES_ONLY and JFileChooser.DIRECTORIES_ONLY.

initialize

protected void initialize()
Initializes this AbstractFilePropertyEditor. You might overwrite this method as shown in the following example in order to implement your specialized file or directory selection components: 
 void initialize() {
        // Your stuff here, e.g.:
        this.dialogTitle = "Select your home directory";
        this.fileSelectionMode = JFileChooser.DIRECTORIES_ONLY;
 
        // Don't forget this at the end!!!
        super.initialize();
 }
